generif.text: Observational study of gene-disease association. (HuGE Navigator)

data provide a mechanism by which mTORC1 activation may be finely regulated in a tissue-specific manner in response to injury, and a paradigm by which lncRNAs encoding small polypeptides like SPAR can modulate general biological pathways and processes to facilitate tissue-specific requirements, consistent with their restricted and highly regulated expression profile
decreased LINC00961 might play a key role in non-small cell lung cancer (NSCLC) progression, and may serve as a novel prognostic marker in human NSCLC

Overexpression of LINC00961 significantly suppressed glioma cells proliferation, migration, and invasion. Mechanistically, we found that overexpression of LINC00961 inhibited glioma cell epithelial-mesenchymal transition .
LINC00961 is involved in renal cell carcinoma progression by targeting the epithelial-mesenchymal transition pathway.

Functionally, LINC00961 overexpression obviously inhibited cell proliferation, migration, and invasion in hepatocellular carcinoma cells. Mechanistically, LINC00961 regulated cardiolipin synthase 1 expression via sponging miR-5581-3p.
Long noncoding RNA LINC00961 inhibited cell proliferation and invasion through regulating the Wnt/beta-catenin signaling pathway in tongue squamous cell carcinoma.
STAT1-avtiviated LINC00961 regulates myocardial infarction by the PI3K/AKT/GSK3beta signaling pathway.
LINC00961 suppresses cell proliferation and induces cell apoptosis in oral squamous cell carcinoma.
Study revealed that Linc00961 was downregulated in skin melanoma (SM), and was identified as a ceRNA that inhibits the proliferation and invasion of SM cell lines by modulating the miR367/PTEN axis.
Downregulation of linc00961 contributes to promote proliferation and inhibit apoptosis of vascular smooth muscle cell by sponging miR-367 in patients with coronary heart disease.
The LINC00961 transcript and its encoded micropeptide, small regulatory polypeptide of amino acid response, regulate endothelial cell function.
LINC00961 inhibits the migration and invasion of colon cancer cells by sponging miR-223-3p and targeting SOX11.
Evolutionary Characterization of the Short Protein SPAAR.
Dysregulated LINC00961 Contributes to the Vitality and Migration of NSCLC Via miR-19a-3p/miR-19b-3p/miR-125b-5p.
LncRNA LINC00961 regulates endothelialmesenchymal transition via the PTENPI3KAKT pathway.

BP.term: regulation of skeletal muscle tissue regeneration
cellular response to amino acid stimulus

name: small regulatory polypeptide of amino acid response
other_names: small regulatory polypeptide of amino acid response
small regulatory polypeptide of amino acids response
summary: Involved in cellular response to amino acid stimulus and negative regulation of TORC1 signaling. Located in late endosome membrane. Is integral component of lysosomal membrane. Colocalizes with lysosomal proton-transporting V-type ATPase complex. [provided by Alliance of Genome Resources, Apr 2022]
